status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 2b51f7cb4e53e38c4a63afc10f379d1b582b62a1 and contender = bc219186db40ec6966eab91ee2dec24b2ebcfca1. bc219186db40ec6966eab91ee2dec24b2ebcfca1 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/3392a63b7cc141eeaa19f0b66578eeac...bf076cb55b2d4d278e9a1ce0066cfbee/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/44b0f1b767524cd6ae2cbdf8721f5a5f...7dc6afbefead4aef972d424f0692db4d/)

   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: langs = C++, Java
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: cloud = True
